headline: Chip Gear Stocks Rise On Improved Outlook. Two Get Price-Target Hikes.
summary: Semiconductor equipment stocks, including KLA and Lam, have been on the upswing lately amid an improving outlook for the sector.

headline: Trump Team Discussed Tougher Chip-Equipment Curbs on China
summary: Commerce Department officials discussed broadening export controls on chip-making equipment going to China in the runup to recent trade talks in London. A White House official said the escalation is no longer actively being considered, but it adds to the Trump administration's arsenal if tensions flare up again.

raw.headline: Trump Team Discussed Tougher Chip-Equipment Curbs on China
